level.heading: Administrative penalty.
level.text: The Mayor may assess a civil penalty against an athlete agent not to exceed $25,000 for a violation of this part.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-107
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 17 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
